title: 原版官方启动器装了1.12.2forge后一直报错
author: 123-LK
txt_content:
forge：1.12.2-forge1.12.2-14.23.5.2814
启动器：Minecraft Launcher 1.6.91
错误信息：[06:23:43 ERROR]: Gave up trying to download http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/net/minecraftforge/forge/1.12.2-14.23.5.2814/forge-1.12.2-14.23.5.2814.jar for job 'Version & Libraries'
[06:23:44 WARN]: Couldn't download http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/com/typesafe/config/1.2.1/config-1.2.1.jar for job 'Version & Libraries'
java.lang.RuntimeException: Server responded with 404
        at com.mojang.launcher.updater.download.ChecksummedDownloadable.download(ChecksummedDownloadable.java:84) ~[launcher.jar:1.6.91]
        at com.mojang.launcher.updater.download.DownloadJob.popAndDownload(DownloadJob.java:109) [launcher.jar:1.6.91]
        at com.mojang.launcher.updater.download.DownloadJob.access$000(DownloadJob.java:12) [launcher.jar:1.6.91]
        at com.mojang.launcher.updater.download.DownloadJob$1.run(DownloadJob.java:86) [launcher.jar:1.6.91]
        at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Executors.java:511) [?:1.8.0_51]
        at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:266) [?:1.8.0_51]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:1142) [?:1.8.0_51]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPoolExecutor.java:617) [?:1.8.0_51]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) [?:1.8.0_51]
[06:23:44 ERROR]: Gave up trying to download http://files.minecraftforge.net/maven/com/typesafe/config/1.2.1/config-1.2.1.jar for job 'Version & Libraries'
[06:23:44 ERROR]: Job 'Version & Libraries' finished with 2 failure(s)! (took 0:00:08.468)

求解啊，如果是forge安装方式的问题，能不能教我下怎么装[穷的只剩那么多金粒了，我也不怎么上论坛]

replies.author: Zheng_Hong_yuan
replies.txt_content: 弄个谷歌上网助手，然后到files.minecraftforge.net这个网站下forge，等广告，然后点击右上角的skip，然后打开，点击确定就装好啦

replies.author: 天堂TT
replies.txt_content:
[06:23:43 ERROR]: Gave up trying to download http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... .2-14.23.5.2814.jar for job 'Version & Libraries'
[06:23:44 WARN]: Couldn't download http://files.minecraftforge.net/ ... .1/config-1.2.1.jar for job 'Version & Libraries'
第一行就说明了情况，尝试下载xxx，然后下载失败了。挂一下梯子？

replies.author: xiaodong150
replies.txt_content: 这个是找不到下载地址，你看你的下载地址然后给他换下，404的意思就是页面找不到

replies.author: C__C
replies.txt_content: 不要听他们废话  你在官方登录器就能安装forge安装50以下的  最新的版本和其他两个不兼容  所以会报错

replies.author: ytzytz520
replies.txt_content: 重新下一个驱动器就好了
